digital_twin_section.description: Unreal Engine-based digital twin enables zone-specific exploration of Water Alley's transformation. Toggle intervention layers to test design combinations and assess spatial impact.
digital_twin_section.title: Digital Twin

hero.description: A four-zone alley infrastructure project in Pico-Union, Los Angeles. This platform demonstrates site-specific design interventions through real-world documentation and 3D spatial simulation.
hero.subtitle: Spatial Planning & Digital Twin Visualization
hero.title: PUHC Innovation Alleys

interventions_section.subtitle: Infrastructure improvements applied to specific alley zones based on existing conditions and spatial compatibility.
interventions_section.title: Three Design Intervention Systems

problem_statement.paragraph_1: Los Angeles contains over 900 miles of underutilized alleys that are heat-exposed, lack community infrastructure, and remain disconnected from neighborhood activity. Water Alley serves as a prototype for systematic transformation.
problem_statement.paragraph_2: Located between W 11th and W 12th Street in Pico-Union, Water Alley is divided into four distinct infrastructure zones. This platform demonstrates zone-specific design interventions through site documentation and Unreal Engine-based spatial simulation.
problem_statement.title: Urban Alley Infrastructure Challenge

zones_section.subtitle: Water Alley is divided into four physical zones, each with distinct characteristics and infrastructure needs. Explore existing conditions and proposed interventions by area.
zones_section.title: Four Transformation Zones
